protein.specific_function: Cytotoxin and helminthotoxin. Also induces non-cytolytic histamine release from human basophils. Involved in antiparasitic defense mechanisms and immune hypersensitivity reactions. The proform acts as a proteinase inhibitor, reducing the activity of PAPPA

subcellular_locations.subcellular_location: Eosinophil granule major basic protein:Cytoplasmic vesicle
